com.bumptech.glide
Class Glide.ModelRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.Glide.ModelRequest
Enclosing class:
Glide
public static class Glide.ModelRequest
extends java.lang.Object

A Glide.ModelRequest builder that returns a request for a model that represents an image.

Method Summary
 Glide.Request<java.io.File> load(java.io.File file)
          Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for File to load the image represented by the given File.
 Glide.Request<java.lang.Integer> load(java.lang.Integer resourceId)
          Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for Integer to load the image represented by the given Integer resource id.

          Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for String to load the image represented by the given String.

          Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for Uri to load the image at the given uri.
 Glide.Request<java.net.URL> load(java.net.URL url)
          Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for URL to load the image represented by the given URL.

loadFromImage(T model)

Method Detail

using

public <T> Glide.ImageModelRequest<T> using(StreamModelLoader<T> modelLoader)
Set the ModelLoader to use for for a new load where the model loader translates from a model to an InputStream resource for loading images.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model.
Parameters:
modelLoader - The model loader to use.
Returns:
A new Glide.ImageModelRequest.

using

public <T> Glide.VideoModelRequest<T> using(FileDescriptorModelLoader<T> modelLoader)
Set the ModelLoader to use for a new load where the model loader translates from a model to an ParcelFileDescriptor resource for loading video thumbnails.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model.
Parameters:
modelLoader - The model loader to use.
Returns:
A new Glide.VideoModelRequest.

load

public Glide.Request<java.lang.String> load(java.lang.String string)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for String to load the image represented by the given String. Defaults to StreamStringLoader.Factory and StreamStringLoader to load the given model.

Parameters:
string - The string representing the image. Must be either a path, or a uri handled by StreamUriLoader
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the model into
See Also:
using(StreamModelLoader)

load

public Glide.Request<android.net.Uri> load(android.net.Uri uri)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for Uri to load the image at the given uri. Defaults to StreamUriLoader.Factory and StreamUriLoader.

Parameters:
uri - The uri representing the image. Must be a uri handled by StreamUriLoader
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the model into
See Also:
using(StreamModelLoader)

load

public Glide.Request<java.net.URL> load(java.net.URL url)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for URL to load the image represented by the given URL. Defaults to VolleyUrlLoader.Factory and VolleyUrlLoader to load the given model.

Parameters:
url - The URL representing the image.
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the model into
See Also:
using(StreamModelLoader)

load

public Glide.Request<java.io.File> load(java.io.File file)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for File to load the image represented by the given File. Defaults to StreamFileLoader.Factory and StreamFileLoader to load the given model.

Parameters:
file - The File containing the image
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the model into
See Also:
using(StreamModelLoader)

load

public Glide.Request<java.lang.Integer> load(java.lang.Integer resourceId)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for Integer to load the image represented by the given Integer resource id. Defaults to StreamResourceLoader.Factory and StreamResourceLoader to load the given model.

Parameters:
resourceId - the id of the resource containing the image
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the model into
See Also:
using(StreamModelLoader)

loadFromImage

public <T> Glide.Request<T> loadFromImage(T model)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for the given model type to load the image represented by the given model.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model to load.
Parameters:
model - The model to load.
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load and ultimately the target to load the image into.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If no such ModelLoaderFactory is registered for the given model type.

loadFromVideo

public <T> Glide.Request<T> loadFromVideo(T model)
Use the ModelLoaderFactory currently registered for the given model type for ParcelFileDescriptors to load a thumbnail for the video represented by the given model.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model to load.
Parameters:
model - The model to load.
Returns:
A Glide.ModelRequest to set options for the load an ultimately the target to load the thumbnail into.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If no such ModelLoaderFactory is registered for the given model type.
